metadata.title: CVE-2023-52762 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:virtio-blk: fix implicit overflow on virtio_max_dma_sizeThe following codes have an implicit conversion from size_t to u32:(u32)max_size = (size_t)virtio_max_dma_size(vdev);This may lead overflow, Ex (size_t)4G -> (u32)0. Oncevirtio_max_dma_size() has a larger size than U32_MAX, use U32_MAXinstead.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
